response.overview: "Horror at Tombstone" immediately sets the scene in a historically significant and evocative location, priming the reader for a Western-themed horror story. From the opening line that plunges the reader directly into a high-stakes situation - an execution.  Delivers a shocking twist  Dark, disturbing content  Uses an unconventional narrative structure to disorient the reader  Blends elements of crime, horror, historical fiction and psychological thriller
response.tagline: "Horror at Tombstone" will provoke thought about historical injustices and human nature's darker sides.
response.title: Horror at Tombstone
